column5: It was certainly was fun indeed... We were all talking about doing it again in about a month so stay tuned for more good times
Hey Vinnie wheres the pics
Yeah! We want the pics on that! And, who was the star of the show?
I will have them up tonight!
Fun times and good chats!
Someone was late!LOL
AHHHHHHHHHH Thanks, looks like a good time!
Roy you can have all kinds of fun when your with great friends... you know that

Better late than never vinny. Nice to have some board members in Hamilton,plus close to home and on my way back from fishin. It's was tuff getting up at 4:30am to get back to the river. Nice seeing you guys again. We got beat out in the last few mins of the derby, we look like 2 dogs with our tail between are legs  OH well, better luck next year.

I put in a long day Stateside on Sat then headed north to fish the Notty on Sun..Was in bed by 8pm on Sat.  It did cross my mind to join you guys but I was too bagged.  Problem is this time of year I'm always fishing. We'd have to have a GTG on the river somewhere.
My band ended up doing a private party, and I ended up sleeping on a picnic table for a few hours afterwards....  Looks like a fun time was had by all... I'll be sure to make it next time.
Hmm, now I'm a little leary of showing up....    J/K... I'll be there....
Any one else going to show Solo how about you...
Hope to see lots of faces.  How brave are you Vince?
Oh! no!  Im gonna get it for sure! Shoot, Lonnietoon, the jay, Hthm,Bigugli Im a gonner for sure! Hail mary full of grace, please help me!NOW!!!Amen Kiddin aside!Your all good gents!
This should be fun..Wonder who else will grace us with their presence
I think I can make it.
that's great news who else is going to show... come on guy's and gal's lets have some fun
Can we get a count on who is going to show up Saturday Night Oct 16 and time??? :whistling:Rumak's is the place on Upper Wellington between Brucedale &* Queensdale
Is there boat parking???? I hope to be boating that day.
doubtful albert... unless you park at the Olco next door which will be closed.
Sorry guys, there goes the door prize......
Count me in!Still to find a sitter! Albert, park the boat at the funeral home!We are dieing to see it!
I may make it, I'm fishing the Caledonia Walleye derby for 3 days, will need the boat parking. Plus don't mind the Walleye slim smell I hope to have on my hands.
Love to but I will be fishing lake Babaganouche on Oct 16th.
Ah whats a little Slim between Friends
To Bad that you can't make it Pete.. It would have been great to see you again... It's been a while....
Hey guys, sorry I can't make it...I will be fishing Quinte this weekend participating in the Fall Walleye Institute with Sheldon Hatch and Gord Schultz.  You can check them out at www.ezelo.com.
TTT
Albert, you bringing your boat? I need a casting deck for a casting contest!
Nope it's in the shop still
My eyes may be half closed, but I'll be there.
That's better than normal..... BTW take along some worm harnesses, I need to BUY some from you.
hope you can make it dave, take pictures Pete!
See every one there around 7.30 to 8.00pm.. Lets have some fun

Well. it was a great evening. Not the biggest crowd, but a great group of folks. Nice to finally put some faces to names. I couldn't stay later,  else I might have fallen asleep at the table. Great to finally meet Loonietoon, Gerritt, and the Fish Farmer.  Always happy to see HTHM and Vinnimon.
Who is in for a GTG next weekend Fri or Sat evening and where should we have it????? It's been a while for us to GTG
Im in!Just have to find a sitter! Boomers is in the middle of the 4 of us! Upper paradise and St church!For me I dont care! FWI friday nights they have karioke!Sat nights are quite!
okay Boomers Sat night Oct 9 ??? who is in??? Any other suggestions ??
Bumpity Bump
Would love to come but I'm too busy Thanksgiving weekend
Dan get out that BPS Bobber of yours  and get your butt down here!
I am game... name the day.
As Dan said, thanksgiving weekend. I am willing to host in my shop, but not till the following weekend. Oct 15.
Still open for dates & place ... Albert's the weekend after or were ever?????
What about Rumak's on Upper Wellington @ Brucedale.. I am flexible on dates.
Saturday after Thanksgiving?That suites me a bit better!As for where,dont care!
Looking at Oct 16/10.... Place???? Albert's ...Rumak's....Boomers...???
OK October 16th, Rumak's I will be there... Say 8pm?
Sounds good to me,albert, kelvin?Good for you!Anyone else agree?Mike? Jay?
If every one agrees then this will be it Rumak's say around 8.00pm on Upper Wellington between Brucedale & Queensdale before the gas station I believe
If I get back from running the new boat on time, I'll be there.
sounds good to me!Now to find a sitter!
Albert no excuses now
I'll see if I can drag my sad and sorry   out that night.
I will see you guys there as well, will be good to meet all of you
Bump back to the top... come on friends lets see if we can take over the place /.... OFC  style....
Loonietoon, Ive got a little game and little prize in mind for the gtg!LOL! Btw Bumpty bump bump bump!
Don't you dare start this again

Start what? It will be fun , its fishing related!Skill test infact(casting skills)! After a few brews!More challenging than what you think!Try casting with what Im bringing!LOL! you have any 2 or 4 lb test line? This outta be fun for sure!
